scripts.client:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development CUSTOM_NODE_ENV=development npm run this:start --prefix client
scripts.client:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_NODE_ENV=production npm run this:build --prefix client
scripts.client:productionDev: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_NODE_ENV=production npm run this:start --prefix client
scripts.server:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development CUSTOM_NODE_ENV=development npm run this:start --prefix server2
scripts.server:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_NODE_ENV=production npm run this:build --prefix server2
scripts.project:install: npm run prepare && npm run client:install && npm run server:install
scripts.project:uninstall: npm run client:uninstall && npm run server:uninstall
scripts.project:reinstall: npm run project:uninstall && npm run project:install
scripts.project:build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'update' && git push && git status
